features.description: Fix appointment routes returning 404 - TDD approach: First verify test expectations, then fix route handlers to match. Focus on /api/appointments endpoints.
Fix appointment route path registration - Tests expect certain routes to exist. Read tests to understand expected routes, then ensure Express router registers them correctly.
Fix credentialing wizard API endpoints - TDD: Tests define expected API contract. Read failing tests to understand what endpoints should do, then implement to satisfy tests.

Fix therapist matcher boundary conditions - Tests are failing on edge cases. TDD approach: Read test cases to understand invariants (distance limits, score ranges), then fix matcher logic to respect these boundaries.

Fix therapist matcher score calculation invariants - Tests expect certain scoring rules. Read tests to understand: minimum scores, maximum scores, weighting rules. Then fix implementation to match test expectations.
Fix MFA email functionality - TDD: Tests define expected email behavior (templates, recipients, content). Read test expectations, then fix email service to match.
Fix MFA SMS functionality - TDD: Read tests to understand expected SMS behavior (format, delivery, validation). Then implement to satisfy test contract.

Fix proximity distance calculations - TDD: Tests expect accurate distance calculations. Read test cases (expected distances for known coordinates), then fix haversine formula or distance calculation logic.

Fix test interference - shared state issue. TDD principle: Tests should be isolated. Identify tests that pass alone but fail together, find shared state (database, cache, global variables), add proper setup/teardown.
